text: "Time" is a song by American rapper NF, released on July 12, 2019 as the fourth single from his fourth studio album, The Search (2019). The song is NF's second highest-charting song on the Billboard Hot 100 to date, peaking at number 41. == Composition == The song is centered on NF's relationship with a woman, which is characterized by misunderstandings and tensions. Nevertheless, he is still deeply in love with her and is trying to hold on to the relationship. He explains that he is willing to change, but will need to take time. == Charts == === Weekly charts === {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Lithuania (AGATA) | 37 |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ) | 12 |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| US Rolling Stone Top 100 | 34 |} === Year-end charts === {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) | 64 |- ! scope="row"| US Mainstream Top 40 (Billboard) | 45 |- ! scope="row"| US Rhythmic (Billboard) | 44 |} == Certifications == == References == Category:2019 singles Category:2019 songs Category:NF (rapper) songs Category:Songs written by Tommee Profitt Category:Songs written by NF (rapper)
